content: संध्या {@--1@} Union. {@--2@} Joint, division. {@--3@} Morning or evening twilight; अनुरागवती संध्या दिवसस्तत्पुरस्सरः . अहो दैवगतिश्चित्रा तथापि न समागमः <ls>K. P. 7.</ls> {@--4@} Early morning. {@--5@} Evening, dusk. {@--6@} The period which precedes a {%Yuga%}, the time intervening between the expiration of one {%Yuga%} and the commencement of another; <ls>Ms. 1. 69.</ls> {@--7@} The morning, noon, and evening prayers of a Brāhmaṇa; <ls>Ms. 2. 69</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">4. 93.</ls> {@--8@} A promise, an agreement. {@--9@} A boundary, limit. {@--10@} Thinking, meditation. {@--11@} A kind of flower. {@--12@} <ab>N.</ab> of a river. {@--13@} <ab>N.</ab> of the wife of Brahman. {@--14@} Any one of the divisions of the day (पूर्वाह्ण, भध्याह्ण, अपराह्ण.).
